Docs.summary: 将 复制到数组。

remarks.format:
## Examples
下面的示例演示了此方法的一种用法：
```csharp var customer = (from c in db.Customers where c.CustomerID == "ALFKI" select c).Single();
var orderArray = new Order[customer.Orders.Count]; customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray,0); ```
```vb Dim customer = (From c In db.Customers _ Where c.CustomerID = "ALFKI" _ Select c).[Single]()
Dim orderArray As New Order(customer.Orders.Count - 1) {} customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray, 0) ```
